channel.title: Sorting out ncp drops
channel.description:
i need to sort out my ncp drops but when i open my NCPdrops.class file it doesnt work, it says somthing like 'windows cannot open this file, windows will atoumaticly look on the internet to find it, ok?' i click on ok and a site comes up saying windows cannot find it, search again?
so this is really pissing me off :mad: so please, any help would be apreciated :rolleyes:[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 04:29:01 AM[/size][hr]nvm got it working yay
